articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Mr Trump, believed to be worth $2.6 bn, has approached 30 companies about a bond for his NY fraud case.
articles.title: Trump lawyers say getting $464m bond in fraud case an 'impossibility'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The president addresses thousands in Moscow after official figures suggest he won 87% of the vote.
articles.title: Putin hails illegal annexation of Crimea after claiming election win

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Details are also released of President Biden's high-stakes call to Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu.
articles.title: Israel Gaza: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader Marwan Issa

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Unilever is to shed 7,500 jobs worldwide and spin off its unit which makes Ben & Jerry's and Viennetta.
articles.title: Unilever is cutting jobs and splitting off its ice cream unit

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Despite controversy China's Temu is becoming a global online shopping force.
articles.title: How Temu is shaking up the world of online shopping

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The central bank had previously cut the rate below zero to try and stimulate Japan's stagnating economy.
articles.title: Japan raises interest rates for first time in 17 years

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Former billionaire Hui Ka Yan has been fined and faces being banned from the financial market for life.
articles.title: Evergrande: China property giant and its founder accused of $78bn fraud

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC gets rare access to a US aircraft carrier trying to protect merchant vessels in the Red Sea.
articles.title: US Navy aircraft carrier faces relentless battle against Houthi attacks

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Bodies pile up even in the "safest" areas of Port-au-Prince, a capital city reeling from gang warfare.
articles.title: 'Only God can change this place': Haitians see no end to spiralling violence

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The actress plays the Newsnight journalist in a new film that recreates her Prince Andrew interview.
articles.title: Scoop: Why Gillian Anderson found it 'scary' to play Prince Andrew interviewer Emily Maitlis
